root.name: Cure Mate Club
root.description: OverviewCure Mate Club is a visual novel by Atu Works. It is about a young teacher who takes a temporary job at an exclusive all girls school, and finds himself in the crosshairs of the president of its powerful Cure Mate Club. Originally an eroge released on PC in 2010, it was later ported to iOS and the PlayStation Vita by Daidai with the adult content removed.
